/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The buildings are predominantly white and gray, reflecting the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the city and casting shadows that add depth to the image. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
